words.def: the sound of growling (as made by animals)
pass into a condition gradually, take on a specific property or attribute
Any dark-skinned person. Most commonly used to refer to people of Indian, North African, Mediterranean, or Middle Eastern ancestry.
nocturnal bird of prey with hawk-like beak and claws and large head with front-facing eyes
an air mass of lower pressure
an arrangement of objects or people side by side in a line
a segment of the trunk of a tree when stripped of branches
a time for working (after which you will be relieved by someone else)
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
